paper_abstract: This short note shows how a simple extension of object types with consensus number 2 boosts them to an infinite consensus number. This extension is a simple embedding of a shared memory write within the base operation defining the corresponding type with consensus number 2. The style of this note is voluntarily informal. (c) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on atomicity: Boosting Test&Set to solve consensus
